attributes.action: save the terrified,beaten horses from slaughter at red lion abattoir in nantwich
attributes.additional_details:
we need your help urgently to SAVE THE HORSES FROM SICK SLAUGHTERMEN AT RED LION ABATTOIR IN NANTWICH,CHESHIRE.

THESE TERRIFIED HORSES ARE BEING CRAMMED INTO SLAUGHTER PENS IN TWO'S AND THREE'S AND BEING SLAUGHTERED IN SIGHT OF ONE AND OTHER.THESE HORSES ONCE SOMEONES BELOVED PET END THEIR LIVES IN THE MOST HORRIFIC WAY,WHEN THEY SHOULD BE LEADING A HAPPY ENDING OUT IN PASTURES GREEN.
THE TERROR THEY HAVE FACED IS BEYOND BELIEF,SOME REGAINING CONSCIOUSNESS AS THEY ARE BEING SLAUGHTERED.
THIS EVIL MUST BE STOPPED,AS THE HORSEMEAT IS USED FOR EXPORT AND LINING POCKETS FINANCIALLY, OUR HORSES DESERVE A HAPPY AND CARING LIFE ONCE RETIRED, OR PUT TO SLEEP IN A HUMANE WAY IF FOR ANY REASON IT CANNOT BE THE CASE.
RED LION ABATTOIR MUST BE STOPPED FROM SLAUGHTER OF ALL HORSES,AND THE GOVERNMENT NEEDS TO TAKE IMMEDIATE ACTION TO BAN SLAUGHTER OF HORSES,AND USE A HUMANE METHOD OF EUTHANASIA AS WE DO WITH OTHER PETS.CLOSE DOWN RED LION ABATTOIR AT SOUND NEAR NANTWICH, CHESHIRE.
